New Adult Books-on-CD

New Arrivals Added To Our Adult Books-on-CD Collection in the last 7 days

View all on one page

Sign up for new Book-on-CD emails

Title Date added
A death in the family by Agee, James, 1909-1955.

On a sultry summer night in 1915, Jay Follet leaves his house in Knoxville, Tennessee, to tend to his father, whom he believes is dying. The summons turns out to be a false alarm, but on his way back to his family, Jay has a car accident and is killed instantly. Dancing back and forth in time and braiding the viewpoints of Jay's wife, brother, and young son, Rufus, Agee creates an overwhelmingly powerful novel of innocence, tenderness, and loss that should be read aloud for the sheer music of it

 May 7, 2012
A child called "It" one child's courage to survive by Pelzer, David J.

The author's account of his early years describes one of the most severe child abuse cases in California history.

 May 7, 2012
1222 by Holt, Anne, 1958-

A train in Norway careens off track during a blizzard, and the passengers find shelter at a nearby old hotel. They think they are safe until one of them turns up dead. Paralyzed retired police inspector Hanne Wilhelmsen must act fast before the killer strikes again.

 May 7, 2012
